author: cnbc.com
title: National Oilwell Varco First Quarter 2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- National Oilwell Varco, Inc. (NYSE: NOV) will hold a conference call to discuss its first quarter 2018 results on Friday, April 27, 2018 at 10 a.m. (Central Time). NOV will issue a press release with the Company’s results after the market closes for trading on Thursday, April 26, 2018. The call will be webcast live on www.nov.com/investors .
About NOV
National Oilwell Varco (NYSE: NOV) is a leading provider of technology, equipment, and services to the global oil and gas industry that supports customers’ full-field drilling, completion, and production needs. Since 1862, NOV has pioneered innovations that improve the cost-effectiveness, efficiency, safety, and environmental impact of oil and gas operations. NOV powers the industry that powers the world.
Visit www.nov.com for more information.

National Oilwell Varco, Inc.
